channel.title: Newsletters on Scott Larson
channel.description: Recent content in Newsletters on Scott Larson

item.title: Scooter's Fall Newsletter: Whats your backup plan?, Solid State Storage Technology, and Scott's New Office
item.description: Hi, this is Scott Larson you signed up for my quarterly Scooter newsletter from a previous engagement. I also had a class at my office location on learning the basics of the Windows 10 desktop in June of 2018. If you missed it you can check out the slides on my website. In these newsletters I write about new technologies I discover and use in the field. I also deliver solutions based on these discoveries to my customers.

item.title: Scooters June 2018 Newsletter: Finger Print Sign-In, Duplicate Files, and Tracking Customer History
